text: ninnal eviteyayirunnalum maranam ninnale pitikutunnatan‌. ninnal bhadramayi ketti uyarttappetta keattakalkkullilayal pealum. (nabiye,) avarkk valla nettavum vannukittiyal avar parayum; it allahuvinkal ninn labhiccatan enn‌. avarkk valla deasavum badhiccal avar parayum; it ni karanam untayatan enn‌.parayuka: ellam allahuvinre pakkal ninnullatan‌. appeal i alukalkk ent parri? avar oru visayavum manas'silakkan bhavamilla
